content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Users with chronic illness need a platform to access educational resources and collaborate with healthcare providers.",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "A no-code platform where healthcare providers can upload educational resources and connect with patients to provide personalized care plans.",
    "content_solution": "A comprehensive blog that has articles, infographics, and videos to educate patients about chronic illness and how to manage it.",
    "competitors": "HealthTap, MyHealthTeams, HealthUnlocked",
    "differentiator": "Personalized care plans and a community to connect with healthcare providers and other patients with similar conditions."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Parents with young children need a platform to connect with pediatricians and get advice on common health concerns.",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A no-code platform that connects parents with pediatricians for virtual consultations and advice on common health concerns.",
    "content_solution": "A blog with articles and videos that cover common health concerns for young children and provide practical advice for parents.",
    "competitors": "Zocdoc, Teladoc, Amwell",
    "differentiator": "Specialized focus on pediatric care and a community of parents to connect with."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Individuals with mental health concerns need a platform to connect with therapists and access mental health resources.",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "A no-code platform that connects individuals with licensed therapists for virtual consultations and provides resources for self-care.",
    "content_solution": "A blog that covers a range of mental health concerns and provides practical tips for self-care, including mindfulness exercises and stress management techniques.",
    "competitors": "BetterHelp, Talkspace, Amwell",
    "differentiator": "Licensed therapists who specialize in a range of mental health concerns and personalized care plans for each individual."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Individuals with digestive issues need a platform to connect with gastroenterologists and get advice on common digestive concerns.",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "A no-code platform that connects individuals with gastroenterologists for virtual consultations and advice on common digestive concerns.",
    "content_solution": "A blog that covers common digestive concerns and provides practical advice for self-care, including dietary recommendations and lifestyle changes.",
    "competitors": "Zocdoc, Teladoc, Amwell",
    "differentiator": "Specialized focus on digestive health and a community of individuals with similar concerns to connect with."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Individuals with skin concerns need a platform to connect with dermatologists and get advice on common skin concerns.",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "A no-code platform that connects individuals with dermatologists for virtual consultations and advice on common skin concerns.",
    "content_solution": "A blog that covers common skin concerns and provides practical advice for self-care, including skincare routines and product recommendations.",
    "competitors": "Curology, Apostrophe, Dermatica",
    "differentiator": "Licensed dermatologists who specialize in a range of skin concerns and personalized care plans for each individual."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Individuals with chronic pain need a platform to connect with pain specialists and access resources to manage their pain.",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "A no-code platform that connects individuals with pain specialists for virtual consultations and provides resources for self-care and pain management.",
    "content_solution": "A blog that covers common types of chronic pain and provides practical tips for self-care and pain management, including exercise recommendations and mindfulness techniques.",
    "competitors": "PainScale, MyChronicPainTeam, HealthUnlocked",
    "differentiator": "Licensed pain specialists who specialize in a range of chronic pain concerns and personalized care plans for each individual."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Individuals with sleep concerns need a platform to connect with sleep specialists and access resources to improve their sleep.",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "A no-code platform that connects individuals with sleep specialists for virtual consultations and provides resources for self-care and sleep improvement.",
    "content_solution": "A blog that covers common sleep concerns and provides practical tips for self-care and sleep improvement, including sleep hygiene recommendations and relaxation techniques.",
    "competitors": "Sleepio, CBT-i Coach, Sleepstation",
    "differentiator": "Licensed sleep specialists who specialize in a range of sleep concerns and personalized care plans for each individual."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Individuals with mobility concerns need a platform to connect with physical therapists and access resources to improve their mobility.",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "A no-code platform that connects individuals with physical therapists for virtual consultations and provides resources for self-care and mobility improvement.",
    "content_solution": "A blog that covers common mobility concerns and provides practical tips for self-care and mobility improvement, including exercise recommendations and assistive device reviews.",
    "competitors": "K Health, Hims, Hers",
    "differentiator": "Licensed physical therapists who specialize in a range of mobility concerns and personalized care plans for each individual."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Individuals with hearing concerns need a platform to connect with audiologists and get advice on common hearing concerns.",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "A no-code platform that connects individuals with audiologists for virtual consultations and advice on common hearing concerns.",
    "content_solution": "A blog that covers common hearing concerns and provides practical advice for self-care and hearing improvement, including hearing aid reviews and communication tips.",
    "competitors": "Embrace Hearing, ZipHearing, Hear.com",
    "differentiator": "Licensed audiologists who specialize in a range of hearing concerns and personalized care plans for each individual."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Individuals with vision concerns need a platform to connect with optometrists and get advice on common vision concerns.",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "A no-code platform that connects individuals with optometrists for virtual consultations and advice on common vision concerns.",
    "content_solution": "A blog that covers common vision concerns and provides practical advice for self-care and vision improvement, including eye health tips and product recommendations.",
    "competitors": "Warby Parker, Zenni Optical, LensCrafters",
    "differentiator": "Licensed optometrists who specialize in a range of vision concerns and personalized care plans for each individual."
  }
]
